rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 25 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:10 PM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Cavite, Laguna, Bulacan, Pampanga, Quezon and Batangas within the next 3 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Metro Manila(Quezon City, Marikina, Pasig) and Rizal(Cainta, San Mateo, Antipolo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
